name: Skellies Ain't Scary Alpha
description:
*Disclaimer: The game is only in alpha as of now, the full game will be released on Steam* Skellies Ain't Scary is a minimalistic bullet-hell rogue-like! Collect different items and weapons in the dungeon and use them to fight against hordes of enemies and unique bosses!

Credits

Developer: JBroook

Composer: MaximusCXI

Menu art: Scummy

Join our discord!
